Index >  Addons >  Addon.Webcam.SelectSource

Addon.Webcam.SelectSource()

Description

Selects a webcam Data Source by its name.

Syntax

.Addon.Webcam.SelectSource(string strSourceName);

Parameters

<string> strSourceName: The name of the source.

Return value

bool

true indicates success. false indicates failure.

Example

if (DWObject) {
   DWObject.Addon.Webcam.SelectSource("HD Webcam");
}
